product_name: Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW Sleeping Pad
long_description: With a lofty design this self-inflating Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW sleeping pad is one of the thickest pads out there with about 4 in. of padding for dreamy refuge from the cold, hard ground.
short_description: With a lofty design this self-inflating Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW sleeping pad is one of the thickest pads out there with about 4 in. of padding for dreamy refuge from the cold, hard ground.
